description: This course educates business people on the importance and profitability of proper networking. Learn proven and time-tested strategies (not theory), but real strategies to develop your networking base to help grow your company. Identify and build authentic and real relationships at the local and national levels. The Course will provide you with a strategic networking plan including learning about “Return on Time (ROT)” -- and using your time properly to grow your circle of business and personal friendships. Upon completion of this course, you will understand how networking will become one of the most powerful strategies you employ in creating value for your business.
title: Networking - Developing Relationships Into Profits
